name: TICCLTools
description: TicclTools is a collection of programs to process datafiles, together they constitute the bulk of TICCL: Text Induced Corpus-Cleanup. This software consists of individual modules that are invoked by the pipeline system PICCL.

affiliation.name: Centre for Language and Speech Technology

referencePublication.name: PICCL: Philosophical Integrator of Computational and Corpus Libraries
author: Martin Reynaert
Maarten van Gompel
Ko van der Sloot
Antal van den Bosch

entryPoints.name: TICCL-indexer
entryPoints.description: A tool to create an exhaustive index to all lexical variants given a particular Levenshtein or edit distance in a corpus.

entryPoints.name: TICCL-indexerNT
entryPoints.description: A tool to create an exhaustive index to all lexical variants given a particular Levenshtein or edit distance in a corpus.

entryPoints.name: TICCL-anahash
entryPoints.description: A tool to create anagram hashes from a word frequency file. Also creates a 'alphabet' file of the unicode characters that are present in the corpus.

entryPoints.name: TICCL-LDcalc
entryPoints.description: A pre-processing tool for TICCL-rank. Gathers the info from TICC-anahash, TICCL-indexer, TICCL-lexstat and TICCL-unk

entryPoints.name: TICCL-rank
entryPoints.description: ranks a word varian list according to a lot of criteria

entryPoints.name: TICCL-unk
entryPoints.description: a cleanup tool for word frequency lists. creates a 'clean' file with desirable words, an 'unk' file with uncorrectable words and a 'punct' file with words that would be clean after removing puncuation.

entryPoints.name: TICCL-lexstat
entryPoints.description: convert an 'alphabet' file (from TICCL-anahash) into a frequency list of hashes and optionally a list of confusions.
